name: GitHub
description: Exports your GitHub profile, repositories, and starred repositories using Playwright browser automation.

scopes.label: Your GitHub profile
scopes.description: Account profile information such as name, bio, location, and follower counts

scopes.label: Your repositories
scopes.description: Your repository list with metadata like language, stars, and update time

scopes.label: Your starred repositories
scopes.description: Repositories you have starred on GitHub
